index.name: Ben Felda
index.bio: I am a software developer specializing in web technologies, and a graphic artist who loves experimenting with new ideas.  I have a long history teaching in the technology arena and designing courses that inspire curiosity.  My personal website is www.benfelda.com, showcasing my artwork, and other projects I have been working on.
index.title: Ben Felda | Speakers | MKE DOT NET
